original_text: “As for you, son of man, describe to the house of Israel the temple, that they may be ashamed of their iniquities; and they shall measure the plan.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 이 성전을 이스라엘 족속에게 보여서 그들이 자기의 죄악을 부끄러워하고 그 형상을 측량하게 하라

sentences.original_text: As for you, son of man,
describe to the house of Israel the temple,
that they may be ashamed of their iniquities;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 죄악을 부끄러워하게 하려 함이라;

sentences.original_text: and they shall measure the plan.
